file.title: Lookup file path (.csv, .csv.gz)
file.description: Path to lookup file. Reference environment variables via $, e.g.: $HOME/file.csv.

matchMode.title: Match Mode
matchMode.description: Defines the format of the lookup file an implies matching logic that will be performed.

reloadPeriodSec.title: Reload Period (sec)
reloadPeriodSec.description: Periodically check the underlying file for modtime changes and reload if necessary, use -1 to disable. Enable this option for lookups not managed by Stream or in situations where the lookups can be updated by an external process.

addToEvent.title: Add to raw event
addToEvent.description: Whether to add the looked up values to _raw, as key=value pairs.

inFields.title: Lookup field(s)
inFields.description: Field(s) which should be used to key into the lookup table.

eventField.title: Lookup Field Name in Event
eventField.description: Field name as it appears in events.
eventField.$comment: Matches any properly formed property reference where the first segment is a simple attribute name (e.g. property["someProperty"][0].anotherProperty[2]["somethingElse"].

lookupField.title: Corresponding Field Name in Lookup
lookupField.description: (Optional:) The field name as it appears in the lookup file. Defaults to event field name.

outFields.title: Output field(s)
outFields.description: Field(s) to add to events after matching lookup. Defaults to all, if not specified.

lookupField.title: Output Field Name from Lookup
lookupField.description: The field name as it appears in the lookup file.

eventField.title: Lookup Field Name in Event
eventField.description: (Optional:) Field name to add to event. Defaults to lookup field name.
eventField.$comment: Matches any properly formed property reference where the first segment is a simple attribute name (e.g. property["someProperty"][0].anotherProperty[2]["somethingElse"].

defaultValue.title: Default Value
defaultValue.description: (Optional:) Value to assign if lookup entry not found.

matchType.title: Match Type
matchType.description: This attribute further refines how to resolve multiple matches.

ignoreCase.title: Ignore case
ignoreCase.description: Whether to ignore case when performing lookups using Match Mode: Exact.
